title: Health query integration test
description: Implement `tests/test_health.py` with async test_health_query(async_client). Test POSTs GraphQL query `{ health }` to /graphql endpoint. Assert response status 200. Assert response.json()['data']['health'] == 'ok'. Verify database connectivity is checked.
acceptance_criteria:
- test_health_query async function defined
- Uses async_client fixture
- POSTs GraphQL query to /graphql
- Asserts status 200
- Asserts health returns 'ok'
- Test passes with `python -m pytest`
